affixes.name: Overflowing
affixes.description: Healing in excess of a target's maximum health is instead converted to a heal absorption effect.

affixes.name: Skittish
affixes.description: Enemies pay far less attention to threat generated by tanks.

affixes.name: Volcanic
affixes.description: While in combat, enemies periodically cause gouts of flame to erupt beneath the feet of distant players.

affixes.name: Necrotic
affixes.description: All enemies' melee attacks apply a stacking blight that inflicts damage over time and reduces healing received.

affixes.name: Teeming
affixes.description: Additional non-boss enemies are present throughout the dungeon.

affixes.name: Raging
affixes.description: Non-boss enemies enrage at 30% health remaining, dealing 100% increased damage until defeated.

affixes.name: Bolstering
affixes.description: When any non-boss enemy dies, its death cry empowers nearby allies, increasing their maximum health and damage by 20%.

affixes.name: Sanguine
affixes.description: When slain, non-boss enemies leave behind a lingering pool of ichor that heals their allies and damages players.

affixes.name: Tyrannical
affixes.description: Boss enemies have 40% more health and inflict up to 15% increased damage.

affixes.name: Fortified
affixes.description: Non-boss enemies have 20% more health and inflict up to 30% increased damage.

affixes.name: Bursting
affixes.description: When slain, non-boss enemies explode, causing all players to suffer 10% of their max health in damage over 4 sec. This effect stacks.

affixes.name: Grievous
affixes.description: When injured below 90% health, players will suffer increasing damage over time until healed above 90% health.

affixes.name: Explosive
affixes.description: While in combat, enemies periodically summon Explosive Orbs that will detonate if not destroyed.

affixes.name: Quaking
affixes.description: Periodically, all players emit a shockwave, inflicting damage and interrupting nearby allies.

affixes.name: Relentless
affixes.description: Non-boss enemies are granted temporary immunity to Loss of Control effects.

affixes.name: Infested
affixes.description: Some non-boss enemies have been infested with a Spawn of G'huun.
